name: BKMT
description:
♪ What?
It's a rhythm game where bunnies are playing Baka Mitai, the very famous song from Yakuza games.

♪ How?
This is my first game made with Game Maker Studio 2. I also used TV Paint Animation Pro. I also used this very nice tool, and this one. And Audacity. 

To play this game you need a XBOX gamepad. There is no pause, no retry, no highscore function and no exit button (it's windowed so you can easily quit). But you can see a bunny singing, that's neat.

I'm sorry it's only running on PC. 

♪ Why?
This is a christmas gift for my partner who is a huge fan of Yakuza series. 

♪ Thanks!
to foshiagi for the very precious advices, and to FriendlyCosmonaut for the nice tutorials.

Have fun
